name: Battle at the Docks
description:
Battle at the docks is a multiplayer first-person shooter game based on Unity3D. 

Download a copy for you and your friends to battle it out in this multiplayer shooter. 

  • Create a lobby for your friends to join in and battle it out at the docks.
    • Run, Jump, Aim, and Snipe you're way to victory 
    • Play as one of three characters
    • Networking provided with Photon Unity Networking 2
  • Explore the nearby environments to strategize
    • Hide in a warehouse 
    • Snipe from the rooftops
    • Interact with the environment to give yourself an advantage
  • Play with your choice of keyboard/mouse or gamepad controls.
